name: NSAnimationDelegate
desc: A set of optional methods implemented by delegates of NSAnimation objects.

items.name: func animationDidEnd(NSAnimation)
items.desc: Sent to the delegate when the specified animation completes its run.

items.name: func animationDidStop(NSAnimation)
items.desc: Sent to the delegate when the specified animation is stopped before it completes its run.

items.name: func animationShouldStart(NSAnimation) -> Bool
items.desc: Sent to the delegate just after an animation is started.

items.name: func animation(NSAnimation, valueForProgress: NSAnimation.Progress) -> Float
items.desc: Requests a custom curve value for the current progress value.

items.name: func animation(NSAnimation, didReachProgressMark: NSAnimation.Progress)
items.desc: Sent to the delegate when an animation reaches a specific progress mark.
